images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, featuring a tropical beach at sunset with palm trees, complemented by a bright CTA overlay with pricing.

AI-selected These images will highlight top destinations in Thailand, showcasing unique attractions in Phuket, Samui, Bangkok, and Krabi, appealing to the adventurous and cultural aspects of the campaign.

AI-selected These images will highlight top destinations in Thailand, showcasing unique attractions in Phuket, Samui, Bangkok, and Krabi, appealing to the adventurous and cultural aspects of the campaign.

AI-selected These images will highlight top destinations in Thailand, showcasing unique attractions in Phuket, Samui, Bangkok, and Krabi, appealing to the adventurous and cultural aspects of the campaign.
AI-selected These promotional icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users towards booking actions and special offers.
AI-selected These promotional icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users towards booking actions and special offers.
AI-selected These promotional icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users towards booking actions and special offers.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to establish brand identity and trust with the audience.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: Tropical beach with sunset and palm trees, highlighting the beauty of Thailand in autumn.

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the top destinations in Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of Phuket, Samui, Bangkok, and Krabi to entice travelers.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Тайланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, featuring a tropical beach at sunset with palm trees, complemented by a bright CTA overlay with pricing.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
